title: Macaroni Casarole
ingredients: Macaroni, Milk, Cheddar, Gouda, Colby Jack
instructions: Boil pasta, make cheese sauce by combining a fat and starch, cook the sauce until it's nice and thick, cook

title: Spicy Veggie Stir-Fry
ingredients: Bell peppers, Broccoli, Carrots, Soy sauce, Ginger, Garlic, Red pepper flakes
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, sauté garlic and ginger, add veggies and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes, add soy sauce and red pepper flakes, cook until veggies are tender

title: Creamy Tomato Soup
ingredients: Tomatoes, Onion, Garlic, Basil, Cream, Olive oil, Salt, Pepper
instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions and garlic, add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft, blend into a puree, return to heat, add cream, season and garnish with basil

title: Garlic Herb Roasted Chicken
ingredients: Whole chicken, Garlic, Rosemary, Thyme, Olive oil, Salt, Pepper, Lemon
instructions: Preheat oven, rub chicken with herb-garlic mixture, place lemon inside chicken cavity, roast until golden brown and fully cooked

title: Tropical Fruit Salad
ingredients: Mango, Pineapple, Kiwi, Coconut flakes, Mint, Lime zest, Lime juice
instructions: Dice fruits, combine in a bowl, sprinkle coconut flakes, zest and juice of lime, garnish with mint leaves

title: Lemon Herb Grilled Salmon
ingredients: Salmon fillets, Lemon zest, Lemon juice, Garlic, Dill, Olive oil, Salt, Pepper
instructions: Marinate salmon with lemon, herbs, and garlic for 30 minutes, grill each side for 4-5 minutes or until done

title: Chocolate Pudding
ingredients: Cocoa powder, Maple syrup, Vanilla extract, Pinch of salt
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth, chill for an hour before serving

title: Chicken Stuffed Pastry
ingredients: Chicken breasts, Spinach, Feta cheese, Garlic, Pastry rolls, Olive oil, Salt, Pepper
instructions: Sauté spinach and garlic, mix with feta, stuff into chicken breasts, bake until chicken is cooked through

title: Vegetable Quinoa Pilaf
ingredients: Quinoa, Broccoli, Carrots, Peas, Onion, Vegetable broth, Olive oil, Salt, Pepper
instructions: Sauté onions, add quinoa and veggies, cook with broth until quinoa is fluffy and vegetables are tender

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Pancetta, Pecorino Cheese, Black Pepper
instructions: Cook the spaghetti. Mix eggs and cheese. Fry pancetta. Combine all with pepper.

title: Margherita Pizza
ingredients: Pizza Dough, Tomato Sauce, Fresh Mozzarella, Basil, Olive Oil
instructions: Roll out dough, spread sauce, add slices of mozzarella, bake until golden, and garnish with fresh basil.

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Tortillas, Spiced Beef, Salsa, Cheese, Guacamole
instructions: Cook spiced beef, warm tortillas, and assemble with toppings of choice.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: Chicken, Yogurt, Spices, Tomato Sauce, Cream
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill chicken pieces. Prepare sauce with tomatoes and spices. Combine chicken with sauce and serve.
